title: Motorcycles > The Vaccine, Dolly Parton > EVERYTHING 8.9.21
itunes:title: Motorcycles > The Vaccine, Dolly Parton > EVERYTHING 8.9.21
description:
In episode 965, Miles and guest co-host Joelle Monique are joined by comedian Lydia Popovich to discuss Sturgis coming back, California Governor recall, GOP lawsuits, LeVar Burton isn’t going to be the Jeopardy host, Dolly Parton being the GOAT, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Sturgis is happening again…
  2. California Gov Recall
  3. Remember those GOP Congress members that were suing Pelosi for mask mandate?
  4. LeVar Burton isn’t going to be the Jeopardy host…
  5. Listen: Kiki Gyan “Disco Dancer”


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
